Cofield bụ onye Afrịka-Amerịka na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ ma na-akwado ndị nwere nkwarụ n'ọrụ ya na Massachusetts na Los Angeles.

Cofield gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Howard ebe o merụrụ onwe ya ahụ n'ihi ihe mberede, nke mere ka aka ya na ụkwụ ya kpọnwụọ. Ọ bụ onye mbụ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na MIT School of Architecture ebe ọ natara Bachelor of Science na Architecture na 1972, Master of Architecture na 1973 na Master in City Planning na 1974. N'oge ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ, ndị Urban Massachusetts Transit Authority na Ngalaba Housing Urban Development were Cofield n'ọrụ. Ọ nwetakwara MIT Graham-Rotch Foundation Fellowship na 1971, MIT Lawrence B
Anderson Fellowsship na 1972, wee gaa Europe iji mụọ obodo ndị nwere nkwarụ.
Mgbe MIT gasịrị, ọ nwetara PhD ya site na UCLA's Urban Planning Program dị ka onye mbụ nwere nsogbu anọ

N'oge Cofield nọ na MIT na UCLA, o nwere ike inye aka iwebata ohere ndị nwere nkwarụ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ. Cofield bụ onye mbụ nwere ikikere quadriplegic architect na steeti California na onye nduzi quadriplegical mbụ nke Los Angeles Housing Authority, nke ọ lekọtara ruo afọ iri abụọ na anọ.
